name: Debian 13
install_build_deps: sudo -E apt-get install -y locales-all rpm ccache cmake g++ pkg-config zlib1g-dev git python-dev-is-python3 libacl1-dev ninja-build manpages-dev capnproto libcapnp-dev gdb lldb-16 python3-pexpect libzstd1 libzstd-dev jq
install_app_test_deps: sudo -E apt-get install -y tightvncserver xtightvncviewer curl tar bzip2 libdbus-glib-1-2 libreoffice
